Departments

Studies

The Directorate collects precise data and do all the needed studies related to productive and industrial projects.

Energy and Water

We offer innovative and sustainable solutions for the production and consumption of energy and usage of water.

Food Industry

Our vision in the Food Industry department is to be a leading provider of services, researchs and consultancies on agri-food sector.

Technology Broker

We use our knowledge, skills, and resources to increase the productive capacity of the economy.

Accelerator

Accelerating your ideas towards a successful company is our main aim.

Venture Capital

Expanding small businesses into bigger ones.
